name: The Cursed Temple VR
description:
This is an Indie game, inspired by the famous professor shonku. Discover the mysteries of ancient Egypt through his eyes and solve the puzzles through his miraculous inventions. This game takes the player deep inside ancient Egyptian temple to deliver a life like experience.


The game begins with the professor investigating a newly found temple. As he progresses through its intricate pathways he’s faced with the many evil lurking within. Player must explore thoroughly and keep a sharp eye for small details. With the end of each levels the story takes a new turn, so stay tuned for further updates.
